education.desc: I Studied for a higher certificate in Mobile App and web development at Varsity college.
I matriculated in 2021 with a bachelor pass.I switched Accounting with Tourism
IN 2019 I was in grade 10.Business studies, Economics, Maths Lit, Accounting, Life Orientation, English FAL and Tshivenda HL were the subjects that i chose to do.
IN 2017 I started High school at Ribane laka Secondary school which is one of the best high school in the area.
IN 2013 I switched to another school Mveledzo Primary School. This is where I was able to shine and finished the rest of my Primary school at Mveledzo

testimonials.name: Abenathi Sindapi
testimonials.desc: Mufuniwa is great person to be around, he goes out of his way to help those around and makes sure they are doing good.

testimonials.name: Lisa Mbuwa
testimonials.desc: Its wonderful working with Mufuniwa as he is a calm and humble person. He never looks down on anyone and he is the most sweetest person to be around.

testimonials.name: Ridhaa gabier
testimonials.desc: Mufuniwa is a go-getter, when faced with a problem he first tries to solve it before consulting an assistant. He will definitely go far.

testimonials.name: Zulaigah Benjamin
testimonials.desc: I highly recommend Mufuniwa for any web development projects. His exceptional skills, dedication, and eagerness to learn are truly impressive.

testimonials.name: Cheslyn Herman
testimonials.desc: Mufuniwa carries himself well and is a confident individual. Being on his team reassures you that you will meet your goals as he is disciplined.

testimonials.name: Khazimla Mahomana
testimonials.desc: I have known Mufiniwa for a very short time but I have discovered that he is very kind and engages well with his teammates during project.

testimonials.name: Conner Winkworth
testimonials.desc: Mufuniwa is a confident and ambitious young man. His creative thinking and sharp eye for detail is reflected in the work he produces.

testimonials.name: Olwethu Bhiya
testimonials.desc: I am glad to have worked with Mufuniwa, He is a great team player and takes great detail in his work.
